title: AI Personalized Wedding Invitations
pain_points: Manually typing 200+ guest names into design templates
Layouts breaking when names are too long (e.g., 'Christopher' vs 'Jo')
Generic floral designs that lack a personal touch
High cost of custom calligraphy for every envelope/invite
solution_summary: InviteFlow.ai uses context-aware AI to extract wedding details and bulk-render hundreds of personalized, black-tie or casual wedding invites in seconds. No more drag-and-drop struggle. Ensure every guest feels special with their name perfectly typeset on their invitation.

faq.question: Can I use my own guest list?
faq.answer: Yes, simply upload a CSV file and InviteFlow.ai will generate a unique, personalized invitation for every guest.

faq.question: Are the designs high resolution?
faq.answer: Yes, all invitations are rendered in vector-quality PNGs, perfect for sharing via WhatsApp, Email, or printing.

faq.question: Can I customize the fonts?
faq.answer: Absolutely. Our AI suggests fonts based on your wedding vibe (e.g., Elegant Serif for formal, Modern Sans for casual), but you can manually override choices.

title: Automated Corporate Event Invitations
pain_points: HR teams wasting hours on manual invitation design
Inconsistent branding across large guest lists
Last-minute venue changes requiring a full re-do
solution_summary: Professional, on-brand event invitations generated from a single text prompt. Perfect for town halls, holiday parties, and networking mixers. Maintain strict brand guidelines while personalizing for every employee or client.

faq.question: Is InviteFlow.ai secure for company data?
faq.answer: We prioritize data privacy. Your guest lists are used strictly for rendering and are never shared with third parties.

faq.question: Can I add our company logo?
faq.answer: Yes, Enterprise plans support custom asset uploads, including logos and watermarks.

title: Cyberpunk & Tech Launch Invitations
pain_points: Generic templates don't fit the 'tech' or 'dev' vibe
Need for rapid iteration on launch details
Difficulty reaching developers with standard formats
Boring email blasts that get ignored
solution_summary: Our 'Neon' and 'Retrowave' themes are built for tech teams. Just paste your launch notes and get 1,000 unique, system-themed invites. Capture the attention of developers and early adopters with designs that speak their language.

faq.question: What themes work best for hackathons?
faq.answer: Our 'Terminal' and 'Glitch' themes are favorites for hackathons and product sprints.

title: AI Birthday Party Invitations
pain_points: Finding a template that matches a specific theme (e.g., 'Retro 90s')
Spending money on platforms that charge per invite sent
solution_summary: Whether it's a 1st birthday or a 50th bash, InviteFlow.ai creates fun, thematic invites instantly. Describe your theme ('Dinosaur Jungle', 'Space Disco') and watch the AI generate the perfect visuals.

faq.question: Is there a free plan?
faq.answer: Yes! Our Hobbyist plan is perfect for personal events like birthdays, allowing up to 50 guests for free.

title: Elegant Fundraising & Gala Invitations
pain_points: Need for ultra-high-end aesthetics without the agency price tag
Managing complex seating charts and ticket tiers
solution_summary: Create sophisticated, black-tie ready invitations that respect the gravity of your cause. Personalize typically expensive design elements for every donor to increase engagement and turnout.

faq.question: Can I print these invitations?
faq.answer: Yes, our exports are high-DPI and print-ready. You can send the PNGs to any local print shop.
